string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
The wiseman of Henesys, #bAthena Pierce#k, promised to give me the old piece of map in exchange for #b2 DEX Crystals#k.

I've heard about you before through #b#p1032001##k from Ellinia. We don't need to necessarily talk to each other to communicate; we communicate through our minds. You've worked hard to get here. But hey...you're looking for #b#t4031056##k? Of course I also happen to have the piece of the map that shows the book's whereabouts. I've forgotten about it for a while...

But I can't just give you that. I also have been giving away a little bit of my power to all the bowman-hopefuls for hundreds of years, but there have been a sudden rush of people wanting to be the bowman, I've used up most of my power as a result. Get me #b2 #t4005002#s#k and I'll help you find #b#t4031056##k. What do you think? Do you want to do it?

Good choice. #t4005002# is something you can acquire from the monsters on land. Of course it won't be easy to get them but still, I think you are capapble of doing it. I'll be waiting for you here. Best of luck to you!
Hmmm...but without my help you won't be able to find #b#t4031056##k, ever ... anyway if you have a change of heart, please feel free to come back.
Don't you want to feel the excitement of hunting down the monsters from out of nowhere? Only the Bowman can do that...

I don't think you have collected #b2 #t4005002#s#k yet. They can be found through monsters on this land from time to time. It's a challenging task, I know, but I have the utmost faith in you. Best of luck to you.
